document_data.name: Birta Grougg
document_data.mainbody:
'''Birta Grougg''' was a dockworker from the [[Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Oh, oh! "You can really detect the boar shite in the aftertaste!"|Birta Grougg}}
document_data.Description: Birta was a large female [[half-orc]] with grayish hide and dark hair gathered in twin buns.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, as the [[Cult of the Absolute]] menaced the city of Baldur's Gate, Birta Grougg worked in the Gate's docks alongside [[Yves]]. They were known to borrow [[wine]] bottles from the shipments they worked on and, during breaks, sip the alcohol while pretending to be fanciful sommeliers, claimed that they detected notes, smells, and flavors of various foul things in the wine.
